uint8_t( * sLoRaMainCallback::BoardGetBatteryLevel) (void)

Return values

void( * sLoRaMainCallback::LoraRxData) (lora_AppData_t *AppData)

Process Rx Data received from Lora network.

Parameters
[IN]AppData is a buffer to process
[IN]port is a Application port on wicth Appdata will be sent
[IN]length is the number of recieved bytes

Prepares Tx Data to be sent on Lora network.
